file.name: doc.yml
file.content:
servers:
  - description: Local
    url: 'http://localhost:5002'
  - url: 'https://sock-payment.apps.pcfone.io'
    description: PCF One
  - url: 'https://sock-payment.apps.cf.maki.lol'
    description: CF for K8s
components:
  schemas:
    AuthorizationRequest:
      type: object
      x-tags:
        - Payment
      properties:
        amount:
          type: number
          description: Payment amount
    AuthorizationResponse:
      type: object
      x-tags:
        - Payment
      properties:
        authorization:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Authorization'
    Authorization:
      type: object
      x-tags:
        - Payment
      properties:
        authorised:
          description: Flag specifying whether the payment was authorized
          type: boolean
        message:
          description: Approval or rejection message
          type: string
info:
  description: Payment API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
  title: 'Spring Sock Shop: Payment API'
  version: 0.1.0-SNAPSHOT
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
  /paymentAuth:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthorizationRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthorizationResponse'
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthorizationResponse'
        '409':
          description: Conflict
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthorizationResponse'
      summary: Authorize a payment
      tags:
        - Payment
      operationId: authorize-payment
